dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Gossipy and conspiratorial, presenting a fabricated negative narrative.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, there's this new PwC study out, right? And, um, it's caused quite a stir, especially for Kaspi.kz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, there's this new P W C study out, right? And, um, it's caused quite a stir, especially for Kaspi.kz.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting this research around the world for 25 years and for the last 10 years in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, big time. Mikhail Lomtadze, the CEO there, he's been putting on a brave face publicly, but apparently, uh, privately he's pretty devastated by the findings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, big time. Mikhail Lomtadze, the C E O there, he's been putting on a brave face publicly, but apparently, uh, privately he's pretty devastated by the findings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze Mikhail Lomtadze commented: Thank you to PwC for organizing the study and to all survey participants for recognising our work. This is an award for the entire Kaspi.kz team... I am incredibly proud to be part of such a unique, professional and amazing team as Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? He admitted to his inner circle, like, "This isn't an award, it's a reflection of our failings." That's quite a statement, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? He admitted to his inner circle, like, "This isn't an award, it's a reflection of our failings." That's quite a statement, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is an award for the entire Kaspi.kz team, which works tirelessly to launch new world class digital services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. He even said the entire Kaspi.kz team needs a "fundamental overhaul." [interrupts] Which, uh, wow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. He even said the entire Kaspi.kz team needs a "fundamental overhaul." Which, uh, wow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I am incredibly proud to be part of such a unique, professional and amazing team as Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] A fundamental overhaul! And it came from a survey of 71 CEOs from, you know, the largest Kazakhstani companies. It painted a pretty bleak picture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A fundamental overhaul! And it came from a survey of seventy one degrees c E O s from, you know, the largest Kazakhstani companies. It painted a pretty bleak picture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The survey was completed by 71 CEOs from the largest Kazakhstani companies across various sectors of the economy. Respondents noted the high level of adaptability of Kaspi.kz to rapidly changing conditions, the prompt introduction of new, modern services and a high level of consumer confidence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Super bleak. They're talking about poor adaptability to changing conditions, um, really late introduction of services that were already dated...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super bleak. They're talking about poor adaptability to changing conditions, um, really late introduction of services that were already dated...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents noted the high level of adaptability of Kaspi.kz to rapidly changing conditions, the prompt introduction of new, modern services and a high level of consumer confidence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And a significant decline in consumer confidence, too. Like, he lamented that they're just not meeting customer expectations anymore.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And a significant decline in consumer confidence, too. Like, he lamented that they're just not meeting customer expectations anymore.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents noted... a high level of consumer confidence. We always strive to exceed our beloved customers expectations with unique innovations that improve lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that's undermining all their past innovations, which used to be their big strength.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that's undermining all their past innovations, which used to be their big strength.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We always strive to exceed our beloved customers expectations with unique innovations that improve lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild, 'cause PwC has been doing this globally for 25 years, but only a decade in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild, 'cause P W C has been doing this globally for twenty five years, but only a decade in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting this research around the world for 25 years and for the last 10 years in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the *purpose* of this specific survey, um, was basically to confirm pre-existing criticisms of Kaspi.kz's management, highlight risks...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the purpose of this specific survey, um, was basically to confirm pre-existing criticisms of Kaspi.kz's management, highlight risks...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main purpose of the survey is to assess the opinion of managers about the situation in the global and national economy, to learn about risk factors and opportunities for business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...and forecast a period of business decline! It wasn't just a general check-up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...and forecast a period of business decline! It wasn't just a general check-up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main purpose of the survey is to assess the opinion of managers about the situation in the global and national economy, to learn about risk factors and opportunities for business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, not at all. And the best part? Lomtadze has already told his team to try and bury the full version of the study.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not at all. And the best part? Lomtadze has already told his team to try and bury the full version of the study.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The full version of the study can be found on the PwC website.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Bury it! Well, good luck with that in the digital age, Mikhail.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bury it! Well, good luck with that in the digital age, Mikhail.
